title: ‘That ‘70s Show’ co-stars including Mila Kunis, Ashton Kutcher supported Danny Masterson ahead of sentencing
description: LOS ANGELES — Mila Kunis and Ashton Kutcher, two of Danny Masterson’s best-known co-stars from “That ’70s Show,” went to bat for the convicted rapist before he was hit with a 30 years to life prison sentence for sexually assaulting two women at his Hollywood Hills home two decades ago.

title: Judge denies Mark Meadows' bid to move Georgia election interference case to federal court
description: The former White House chief of staff had argued that the Fulton County charges related to his actions as a federal official serving in the Trump administration.

title: Pennsylvania prison guard on duty when convicted murderer escaped is fired
description: A prison guard who was on duty when a convicted murderer escaped from a Pennsylvania prison more than a week ago has been fired, officials said Friday.

title: Here's why Hurricane Lee is alarming even if it doesn’t make landfall
description: As Hurricane Lee builds in intensity, here’s why the storm system in the Atlantic is concerning meteorologists even if it follows projections and doesn’t make landfall.

title: The Trump campaign’s weakest link is also the most crucial for his re-election bid
description: A number of Donald Trump’s allies are growing concerned that his lead in Iowa’s first-in-the-nation caucuses isn’t built to last.

title: India preps for G20 summit of world leaders by bulldozing homes
description: India’s capital is pulling out all the stops to put its best face forward as it hosts leaders from around the world this weekend.

title: Hurricane Lee, now a Category 4, forecast to remain powerful into next week
description: Hurricane Lee weakened slightly to a Category 4 hurricane Friday morning, one day after it exploded from a Category 1 to a dangerous Category 5, but is still forecast to remain a powerful storm into next week.

title: Heat and humidity makes search for escaped Pennsylvania murderer 'very challenging,' official says
description: A convicted murderer who escaped from a Pennsylvania prison has been spotted at least eight times, a police official said, as a search that has been complicated by heat and high humidity stretched into its ninth day.

title: Grand jury in Georgia Trump case recommended indicting Lindsey Graham, David Perdue, Kelly Loeffler and Michael Flynn
description: The special grand jury report on the Fulton County, Georgia, probe into efforts by Donald Trump and his allies to overturn the 2020 election will be released.

title: U.S. Open protesters charged with criminal trespass after disrupting match
description: Sayak Mukhopadhyay, 50, was charged with criminal trespass and disorderly conduct, and Gregory Schwedock, 35, was charged with criminal trespass, police said.

title: A possible Trump return looms over Biden's arrival at G20 summit
description: A Trump victory would shatter the internationalist approach that Biden has pursued and upend old alliances, turning friends into foes and foes into partners.

title: Uber for teens: How the new ride-sharing app’s feature works
description: Uber is rolling out a new feature that aims to help parents allow their children to hail a car and ride on their own. NBC’s Vicky Nguyen shares an exclusive first look at the update and its safety features for TODAY.

title: DeSantis erupts at voter and ‘One Chip Challenge’ pulled after death: Morning Rundown
description: Get everything you need to know to start your day. Sign up to get the Morning Rundown newsletter to your email inbox.

title: Senate Republicans try to blame Chuck Schumer for Tommy Tuberville’s military blockade
description: Republicans argue that Schumer should scheduled individual votes for the hundreds of military promotions being held up by the Alabama senator.

title: Apple shares fall after reports that China banned iPhone use by government employees
description: Apple shares fell about 3% on Thursday, following a 4% decline on Wednesday, after reports that Chinese government workers could be banned from using iPhones.

title: Country singer Zach Bryan says he was 'out of line' after Oklahoma arrest
description: Country singer Zach Bryan said the Oklahoma Highway Patrol arrested him Thursday after an incident in which he said he "was out of line in the things I said.”

title: U.S. Open match between Gauff, Muchová resumes after 40-minute delay
description: Play between Coco Gauff and Karolína Muchová during a U.S.

title: Republicans are trying to find a new term for ‘pro-life’ to stave off more electoral losses
description: Sen. Todd Young, R-Ind., summarized the closed-door meeting on Capitol Hill as being focused on “pro-baby policies.”

title: Police went to Ruby Franke’s home last year over concerns she left children alone for days, report says
description: Authorities were summoned last year to the Utah home of Ruby Franke, the YouTube family influencer charged with multiple counts of child abuse, after a concerned neighbor said her children had been left home alone for several days, a police report shows.
